summary: A test module that uses Moto to mock AWS services and validates the creation of a simple Active Directory directory. It provides helper functions for setting up VPCs and subnets and contains several test cases that check successful creation as well as handling of invalid VPC settings and subnet configurations.
business_intent: Verify that the directory creation logic for a simple Active Directory setup works correctly, handling both valid configurations and error conditions, thereby ensuring reliable integration with AWS Directory Service.
